title: Problems redownloading pbe
body:
Recnetly i have gotten a new computer and cannot find a working link to redownload pbe. The two i have found and tried are listed below:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client
https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

If you could please help i would be very thankful cx.

replies.body: Can you try downloading the client from [here](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/PBE_Client_Shell.zip)? Let me know if this worked.
none of the links are working, any update?
It looks like this may have been related to an issue with patching for players on Windows XP or 10 that should be resolved. Let me know if you're still having this issue.
It says that the site can't be reached either because its down or its been moved.
Yea same problem wish a riot employee or something would look at this

This site can’t be reached

The webpage at http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/LOLPBE.zip might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.
ERR_INVALID_RESPONSE .... im having the same issue
Yes, I'm having the same issue. I cannot download the PBE client from anywhere, as all the links appear to be down.
same issue, please comment on this  again, none of the links are working

Hello,
You can download the PBE Client for Windows by clicking on this [link](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/LOLPBE.zip).

hi, when i click on this link it brings me to a page with the following, 

This site can’t be reached

The webpage at http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/LOLPBE.zip might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address.
ERR_INVALID_RESPONSE

That is odd. 
I can download the client successfully when i click the link. 
Can you try from a different browser?
